articles.author: DNA Web Team
articles.title: New Covid variant ‘Eris’ spreading quickly in UK: Symptoms, other details we know so far - DNA India
articles.description: Eris was classified as a Covid variant on July 31 after UKHSA recorded its prevalence in the country due to rising cases internationally, particularly in Asia.
articles.content: Eris was classified as a Covid variant on July 31 after UKHSA recorded its prevalence in the country due to rising cases internationally, particularly in Asia. A new Covid variant named EG.5.1 or ‘Er… [+1930 chars]
